root.name: Track Painter
root.description: Track Manager plugin that displays available tracks on the selected sequence, in both 2D and 3D viewers, with various visualisation options. Tracks never looked so good!
root.author: adufour - Alexandre Dufour
root.changelog:
- Version 2.0.6.0 Date 2017-06-22 15:29:48
Yet another fix to the fixed fix :/
- Version 2.0.5.0 Date 2017-06-22 15:11:18
Fixed a flickering issue when displaying detections only (no tracks)
- Version 2.0.4.0 Date 2017-06-22 00:41:16
Fixed an issue with screenshots
- Version 2.0.3.0 Date 2016-03-29 15:49:04
* Fixed an issue causing the last detection of each track to disappear * Fixed high CPU usage
- Version 2.0.2.0 Date 2015-12-11 11:33:42
Fixed an issue where some detections would disappear when the level of detail (related to the level of zoom) is too low.
- Version 2.0.1.0 Date 2015-03-26 14:51:39
Fixed an issue when displaying detections on tracks starting at t>0
- Version 2.0.0.0 Date 2015-03-26 00:17:06
* Reworked track display in 2D * New: auto-scale options based on the zoom level (2D and 3D) * New: ability to display only selected tracks
- Version 1.1.0.0 Date 2015-03-20 10:40:41
* NEW: tracks can now be selected in the 2D viewer * Fixed track display when used in combination with the "Time Clip" processor
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2014-10-16 21:18:46
Bump version to 1.0 (online icons, documentation, dependencies, etc.)
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2014-10-16 20:21:49
